That's some heavy stuff FS...I'm totally empty and feeling nothing and dont=
 give a rats ass you know....


From: Adrienne <abortree@...>
To: EVP=
-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, August 7, 2011 10:51 AM
Subject: [EVP-IT=
C] Re: Another melt down?


=C2=A0 
I agree. I always felt that "collecting=
 evidence" with nothing to offer in return was treating them like a circus =
side show and very one-sided and arrogant. Some of them do seem to want to =
just communicate and that's ok, but the attitude on our part was not good. =
They aren't experiments.

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "jamietreetalker"=
 <thequilldriver@...> wrote:
>
> I have to agree with Frank. To me, to thin=
k we are going to find definitive answers
> or that we even have a right to=
 them is a bit obnoxious and self-centered. I like that we can help people =
with the technology we use to communicate with spirit, but approaching it w=
ith the intent of personal gain, in knowledge or othwrwise, is pointless an=
d arrogant. They tell me, though my radios that they love and appreciate me=
 because I listen and I don't demand a performance from them like some kind=
 of flea circus.
> Jamie
> 
> 
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank S=
umption <purplealiengirl@> wrote:
> >
> > I think everyone takes this stuff=
 way tooooooo serious, with too many
> > expectations. I don't care about h=
eavan, the afterlife, or crossing over
> > spirits, or getting the proof, I=
 let "them" talk, and I listen. Not gonna
> > judge what "they" say, and no=
t gonna get offended if it doesn't fit my world
> > view( or lack of world =
view). They tell me earth is doomed, I don't care! *Que
> > Sera, Sera (Wha=
tever Will Be, Will Be).*
> > **
> > I don't know anything, and I don't wan=
na know anything. Everything started
> > from nothing, so the only true rea=
lity is nothing. Meditate on nothing--be
> > nothing! Nothing is everything=
, when you become nothing, you are everything,
> > you know everything. Not=
hing to it!
> > 
> > Yeah, get that past the ego filters.
> > 
> > F-S
> >
=
>
